DOC.brief_summary: To compare the safety and efficacy of once-daily and twice-daily celecoxib versus diclofenac for the treatment of ankylosing spondylitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Celecoxib Versus Diclofenac in the Treatment of Ankylosing Spondylitis
